Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Bust of a king
Description: This piece represents the bust of a king, executed in raised relief (compare with E.2208). The facial traits are reproduced only basically; only the large ears show details. The "nemes" head-dress also merits our attention: the upper part of the lateral bands are totally missing. The bottom, the front side and the lateral faces show squared lines, engraved in the limestone.
